Sentence.sentence: In 1966, soon after the Beatles had finished work on "Rubber Soul", Paul McCartney looked into the possibility of going to America to record their next album.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: That front-page package you've been working on is nearly complete; one last edit and it's finished.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Amusa, who is traveling to India this spring to finish a book, then to Senegal to teach English, has ongoing conversations with her friends about how the Obama presidency has changed their daily lives and hopes to put some of those ideas, along with her global perspective, into her posts.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: I think I can finish early today.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: He has work to finish in time
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: I've got to finish this report.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: So she was not surprised to see a number of hands go up as soon as she finished speaking
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: At least the slides were good, that is, until the bulb in the projector blew, and she had to finish the talk with no illustrations.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Be sure to attend all classes and leave enough time to finish assignments and prepare well for examinations.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: The misconception of resilience is often bred from an early age, parents trying to teach their children resilience might celebrate a high school student staying up until 3am to finish a science fair project.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"结束，完成"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: complete, finish, end, close, conclude, terminate, accomplish
means: complete ： 侧重指完成预定的任务或使某事完善，补足缺少的部分等。
finish ： 与complete基本同义，着重圆满地结束或完成已着手的事。
end ： 最普通用词，着重事情的完成。也指某种活动因达到目的而自然结束或由于某种原因而突然中止。
close ： 普通用词，着重行为的终止或结束，不强调其目的。
conclude ： 正式用词，多指以某事或活动达到预期目的而告终。
terminate ： 强调有一个空间和时间的限度，届时必须终止。书面语用词。
accomplish ： 正式用词，强调一个过程的完成；也可指依靠努力达到一定目的，或取得一定的结果。

stems_affixes.type_exp: =limit,boundary,end 表示"结束,范围,界限,限制"

stems_affixes.word_buile: de加强+fin界限+ite……的→adj.明确的, 一定的
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+al……的→adj.最后的,最终的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有限的;[数]有穷的,限定的
stems_affixes.word_buile: fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ite……的→adj.有限的;[数]有穷的,限定的
in无+finite[adj.有限的;[数]有穷的,限定的]→adj.无限的,无穷的 n.无限
af一再+fin界限+ity表名词→进入范围内→密切关系

stems_affixes.value_cn: 定义,解释;[轮廓影像等的]清晰度;阐明
stems_affixes.word_buile: de加强+fin界限+ition表名词→划出界限→定义
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ale表示音乐类→终曲
final[adj.最后的,最终的]+ity表名词→n.结尾,定局,终结
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ance表名词→最后起作用的东西→资金
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ish表动词→完成;结束[词性变化:表示名词]
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+itude状态→n.有限
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ity表名词→n.有限, 限定
in无+finite[adj.有限的;[数]有穷的,限定的]→adj.无限的,无穷的 n.无限
infinite[adj.无限的,无穷的 n.无限]+itude状态→infinitude无限,无穷数
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ance表名词→最后起作用的东西→资金
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ish表动词→完成;结束[词性变化:表示名词]

Sentence.sentence: After questioning 1, 000 mothers with children under 18, it found that , on most days, mums started their routine work at 7am and finished at around 11pm.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语四川卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: All right, I'll finish school at five o'clock, and I'm free after that.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语北京卷 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: And, before I finish, let me just give you some advice which should make your stay more enjoyable.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语四川卷 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: Before Steve finished "melancholy flower, " his wife join didn't fully realize the value of her husband's music.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读D 题设

Sentence.sentence: Before we finish, can you offer any tips on becoming a better songwriter?
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖北卷 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: But I haven't finished even half of it.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖北卷 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: Creating products out of raw materials creates much more waste material, up to 100 times more, than the material contained in the finished products.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Having worked for two days, Steve managed to finish his report on schedule.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语天津卷 单项填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: He aims to finish his journey by mid-July.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语浙江卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: His son tried hard to finish homework.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读B 选项

Sentence.sentence: I had an early start at the age of nine with a role in a 1990s TV series, but it wasn't until I finished film studies that I pursued my career as an actress.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语天津卷 阅读表达 原文

Sentence.sentence: I have read half of the english novel, and I'll try to finish it at the weekend.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语北京卷 单项选择 原文

Sentence.sentence: I left my seat quietly, giving him some privacy to finish his conversation.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语重庆卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: I tried, but I didn't finish the reading when the bell rang.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语重庆卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: I was one of the final runners to finish.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: I've got to finish reading the yearly financial report by 10.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷1 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: Just two seats over, Andrew Mazoleny, a local videographer, is finishing his lunch at the bar.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Mary has been working really hard on his book and thinks he'll have finished it by Friday.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语陕西卷 单项填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Okay, but let me finish my chemistry homework first.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷3 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: Owain James, the president of the National Union of Students NUS, argued that the increase is evidence of student hardship – young people are being forced into earning money before finishing their education.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: She had a hard time finishing the required reading tasks.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 阅读A 选项

Sentence.sentence: Since finishing my studies at harvard and oxford, I've watched one friend after another land high-ranking, high-paying wall street jobs.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语浙江卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: The author didn't finish the reading in class because he had an attention disorder.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语重庆卷 阅读理解 阅读A 题设

Sentence.sentence: The night before my marathon, I dreamt that I couldn't even find the finish line.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: The professor was delighted to find that two thirds of the project had already been finished by the students independently.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖北卷 句子填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: They did not finish their college education.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语安徽卷 阅读理解 阅读B 选项

Sentence.sentence: When Sandra Day O'Connor finished third in her class at stanford law school, in 1952, she could not find work at a law firm because she was a woman.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: When the music finished, I asked them all to raise their heads slowly so that we could share our musical journeys.

Sentence.sentence: White hasn't finished grading the papers.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 听力 选项

Sentence.sentence: You know, when you're fifteen years old in my country, you finish school and then you learn a trade.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语浙江卷 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: When the EEOB was finished, it was the largest office building in Washington, with nearly 2 miles of black and white tiled corridors.

Sentence.sentence: But while young and old mostly agree on what constitutes the finish line of a fulfilling life, they offer strikingly different paths for reaching it.
Sentence.come: 2016年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: There's always a constant fear of falling behind everyone else on the socially perpetuated "race to the finish line," whether that be toward graduate school, medical school or a lucrative career.
Sentence.come: 2017年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

means.word_mean: 结束, 完成

sentences.en: We'll never finish if we go on at this rate.
sentences.cn: 以这样的速度, 我们永远也完不成。

sentences.en: You must hurry up or you cannot finish it in time.
sentences.cn: 你必须赶紧些, 否则不能及时完成。

sentences.en: Place the book back where you found it when you have finished reading it.
sentences.cn: 看完后把书放回原处。

means.word_mean: 结束, 完成, 最后阶段

sentences.en: He gives the last finish to the table.
sentences.cn: 他对这桌子进行最后的加工。</seg>

sentence.cn: 用原材料制造产品会产生更多的废料，甚至是成品所含废料的100倍。
sentence.en: Creating products out of raw materials creates much more waste material, up to 100 times more, than the material contained in the finished products.
sentence.from: 2015年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

sentence.cn: 这是老师在说话吗?有一个女孩，她刚从一所学校来到我们这里，她在那里度过了一段非常艰难的时光。
sentence.en: Was this a teacher talking?  One girl,  who had just come to us from a school where she had had a very hard time,  looked at me steadily for a long time after I had finished.
sentence.from: 2015年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

means.word_mean: 优雅;完美
结束;完成
其他释义
结束;完成
其他释义

jx.jx_en_mean: a fight, contest, or match which only ends with the complete defeat of one of the parties involved
jx.jx_cn_mean: 一决雌雄（或你死我活）的争斗（或竞赛、比赛）

jx.jx_en_mean: kill, destroy, or comprehensively defeat someone
(chiefly Brit)end a period of time or course of action by doing something or being in a particular position

lj.lj_ly: he finished up as one of Britain's greatest architects.
lj.lj_ls: 他最终跻身英国最伟大的建筑师行列。

entry.def: When you finish doing or dealing with something, you do or deal with the last part of it, so that there is no more for you to do or deal with.

example.ex: As soon as he'd finished eating, he excused himself...
example.tran: 他一吃完就告辞离开了。

example.ex: Mr Gould was given a standing ovation and loud cheers when he finished his speech...
example.tran: 古尔德先生结束演讲后，全场起立鼓掌并热烈欢呼。

entry.def: When you finish something that you are making or producing, you reach the end of making or producing it, so that it is complete.

example.ex: The consultants had been working to finish a report this week.
example.tran: 顾问们一直在为要于本周内完成一份报告而工作。

entry.def: When something such as a course, film, or sale finishes, especially at a planned time, it ends.

example.ex: The teaching day finishes at around 4pm...
example.tran: 一天的教学在下午4点左右结束。

example.ex: When a play finishes its run, many of the costumes are hired out to amateur dramatics companies and schools.
example.tran: 一部戏剧连演结束后，很多服装都会租借给业余剧团和学校。

entry.def: You say that someone or something finishes a period of time or an event in a particular way to indicate what the final situation was like. You can also say that a period of time or an event finishes in a particular way.

example.ex: The two of them finished by kissing each other goodbye...
example.tran: 他们两人最后互相吻别。

example.ex: The evening finished with the welcoming of three new members...
example.tran: 晚会的最后是欢迎3个新成员。

entry.def: If someone finishes second, for example, in a race or competition, they are in second place at the end of the race or competition.

example.ex: He finished second in the championship four years in a row.
example.tran: 他连续4年获得锦标赛亚军。

entry.def: To finish means to reach the end of saying something.

example.ex: Her eyes flashed, but he held up a hand. 'Let me finish.'
example.tran: 她眼光一闪，但他举起一只手说：“让我把话讲完。”

entry.def: The finish of something is the end of it or the last part of it.

example.ex: I intend to continue it and see the job through to the finish...
example.tran: 我打算继续下去，直到工作彻底完成。

example.ex: From start to finish he believed in me, often more than I did myself.
example.tran: 他自始至终都相信我，而且时常超过我对自己的信任。

entry.def: The finish of a race is the end of it.

example.ex: Win a trip to see the finish of the Tour de France!...
example.tran: 赢得观看环法自行车赛最后阶段比赛之旅！

example.ex: The replays of the close finish showed Ottey finished ahead of the Olympic champion.
example.tran: 对难分先后的冲线镜头的回放显示奥蒂先于奥运冠军到达终点。

entry.def: If the surface of something that has been made has a particular kind of finish, it has the appearance or texture mentioned.

example.ex: The finish and workmanship of the woodwork was excellent.
example.tran: 这件木工品的抛光和做工均属上乘。

entry.def: A fight to the finish is one in which one of the people or groups fighting is killed or completely defeated.

example.ex: The conflict in the North and East of the island was a fight to the finish.
example.tran: 该岛北部和东部的冲突是一场你死我活的斗争。

entry.def: If you add the finishing touches to something, you add or do the last things that are necessary to complete it.

example.ex: Right up until the last minute, workers were still putting the finishing touches on the pavilions...
example.tran: 直到最后一刻，工人们仍在对展馆进行最后的修饰。

example.ex: The only finishing touch most of these puddings need is a custard sauce.
example.tran: 这些布丁大部分只需要用蛋奶沙司最后点缀一下。

entry.def: If you finish off something that you have been eating or drinking, you eat or drink the last part of it with the result that there is none left.

example.ex: Kelly finished off his coffee...
example.tran: 凯利喝光了他的咖啡。

example.ex: He took the bottle from her hands and finished it off in one long swallow.
example.tran: 他从她手里夺过瓶子，一饮而尽。

entry.def: If someone finishes off a person or thing that is already badly injured or damaged, they kill or destroy them.
entry.tran: 杀死(已受严重伤害的人);毁灭(已遭严重损坏的物)

example.ex: They meant to finish her off, swiftly and without mercy.
example.tran: 他们打算毫不留情地迅速结果了她。

entry.def: If you finish up in a particular place or situation, you are in that place or situation after doing or experiencing several things.
entry.tran: 最后(处于某地或某种情形)

example.ex: They had met by chance at university and finished up getting married...
example.tran: 他们在大学偶遇，最后结了婚。

example.ex: He's probably going to finish up in jail for business fraud.
example.tran: 他最后很可能会因为商业诈骗而入狱。

entry.def: If you finish up something that you have been eating or drinking, you eat or drink the last part of it.

example.ex: Finish up your drinks now, please.
example.tran: 请现在喝完。

entry.def: If you finish with someone or something, you stop dealing with them, being involved with them, or being interested in them.
entry.tran: 与…断绝关系;对…不再感兴趣;同…不再打交道

example.ex: My boyfriend was threatening to finish with me...
example.tran: 男友威胁说要和我分手。

example.ex: 'Have you finished with me?' Luke asked, when he had listened to Armstrong's report of his evidence.
example.tran: “你已经都问完我了吗?”卢克听完阿姆斯特朗向自己重述的证词后问道。

means.word_mean: 1. a decorative texture or appearance of a surface (or the substance that gives it that appearance);

sentences.sentence: "the boat had a metallic finish"
"he applied a coat of a clear finish"
"when the finish is too thin it is difficult to apply evenly"

means.word_mean: 2. designated event that concludes a contest (especially a race);

sentences.sentence: "excitement grew as the finish neared"
"my horse was several lengths behind at the finish"
"the winner is the team with the most points at the finish"

means.word_mean: 3. the act of finishing;

sentences.sentence: "his best finish in a major tournament was third"
"the speaker's finishing was greeted with applause"

means.word_mean: 4. the place designated as the end (as of a race or journey);

sentences.sentence: "a crowd assembled at the finish"
"he was nearly exhuasted as their destination came into view"

means.word_mean: 5. the temporal end; the concluding time;

sentences.sentence: "the stopping point of each round was signaled by a bell"
"the market was up at the finish"
"they were playing better at the close of the season"

means.word_mean: 6. (wine tasting) the taste of a wine on the back of the tongue (as it is swallowed);

sentences.sentence: "the wine has a nutty flavor and a pleasant finish"

means.word_mean: 7. event whose occurrence ends something;

sentences.sentence: "his death marked the ending of an era"
"when these final episodes are broadcast it will be the finish of the show"

means.word_mean: 8. the downfall of someone (as of persons on one side of a conflict);

sentences.sentence: "booze will be the finish of him"
"it was a fight to the finish"

means.word_mean: 9. a highly developed state of perfection; having a flawless or impeccable quality;

sentences.sentence: "they performed with great polish"
"I admired the exquisite refinement of his prose"
"almost an inspiration which gives to all work that finish which is almost art"--Joseph Conrad

means.word_mean: 1. come or bring to a finish or an end;

sentences.sentence: "He finished the dishes"
"She completed the requirements for her Master's Degree"
"The fastest runner finished the race in just over 2 hours; others finished in over 4 hours"

means.word_mean: 2. finally be or do something;

sentences.sentence: "He ended up marrying his high school sweetheart"
"he wound up being unemployed and living at home again"

means.word_mean: 3. have an end, in a temporal, spatial, or quantitative sense; either spatial or metaphorical;

sentences.sentence: "the bronchioles terminate in a capillary bed"
"Your rights stop where you infringe upon the rights of other"
"My property ends by the bushes"
"The symphony ends in a pianissimo"

means.word_mean: 4. provide with a finish;

sentences.sentence: "The carpenter finished the table beautifully"

means.word_mean: 5. finish eating all the food on one's plate or on the table;

sentences.sentence: "She polished off the remaining potatoes"

means.word_mean: 6. cause to finish a relationship with somebody;

sentences.sentence: "That finished me with Mary"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French feniss-, lengthened stem of fenir, from Latin finire, from finis 'end'

sentences.cn: 她眼光一闪，但他举起一只手说：“让我把话讲完。”
sentences.en: Her eyes flashed, but he held up a hand. 'Let me finish.'

sentences.cn: 他连续4年获得锦标赛亚军。
sentences.en: He finished second in the championship four years in a row.

sentences.cn: 晚会的最后是欢迎3个新成员。
sentences.en: The evening finished with the welcoming of three new members...

sentences.cn: 他一吃完就告辞离开了。
sentences.en: As soon as he'd finished eating, he excused himself...

sentences.cn: 古尔德先生结束演讲后，全场起立鼓掌并热烈欢呼。
sentences.en: Mr Gould was given a standing ovation and loud cheers when he finished his speech...

sentences.cn: 顾问们一直在为要于本周内完成一份报告而工作。
sentences.en: The consultants had been working to finish a report this week.

sentences.cn: 一天的教学在下午4点左右结束。
sentences.en: The teaching day finishes at around 4pm...

sentences.cn: 一部戏剧连演结束后，很多服装都会租借给业余剧团和学校。
sentences.en: When a play finishes its run, many of the costumes are hired out to amateur dramatics companies and schools.

sentences.cn: 他们两人最后互相吻别。
sentences.en: The two of them finished by kissing each other goodbye...

sentences.cn: 我还以为你会完成不了呢！
sentences.en: I thought you'd never finish!

sentences.cn: 难道你还没有完成家庭作业吗？
sentences.en: Haven't you finished your homework yet?

sentences.cn: 我打算继续下去，直到工作彻底完成。
sentences.en: I intend to continue it and see the job through to the finish...

sentences.cn: 顾问们一直在为要于本周内完成一份报告而工作。
sentences.en: The consultants had been working to finish a report this week.

sentences.cn: 男：你这么问很有趣，因为我从来没有感到过：“啊，我完成了！”我看着比赛结束时的足球运动员，你知道的，哨声响起，他们或输或赢。
sentences.en: M:  It's funny you ask that because I never have this moment when I feel, “Ah, I've finished!” I watch footballers at the end of the match, you know, the whistle goes and they've won or lost.
sentences.from: 17年6月六级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 一周除了两个节目之外，他不能再看电视；放学以后，直到完成作业，才可以和朋友玩；每个星期必须读两本书并写出读书报告。
sentences.en: He could not watch television except for two programs a week, could not play with his friends after school until he finished his homework, and had to read two books a week and write book reports about them.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 但是当天下午，即使我已经做完了我那份工作，他还是叫我去帮其他同事完成工作。
sentences.en: But that afternoon, even  though  I’d  finished  my assigned  work,  I  was  told  to help  other  colleagues  finish their work, too.
sentences.from: 16年6月四级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 完成项目各阶段广告文案撰写.
sentences.en: Finish the writing of advertisement copy in different stages of the project.

sentences.cn: 如果我们想在星期四完成这项工作,我们就得快点干.
sentences.en: We have to hurry up this job if we want to finish by Thursday.

sentences.cn: 你受合同的约束,要在本月完成这项建筑.
sentences.en: You have a contractual obligation to finish the building this month.

sentences.cn: 我恰好在最后期限之前完成了我的指派任务.
sentences.en: I finished my assignment just under the wire.

sentences.cn: 从某种意义上说,我们来到国家的首都是为了兑现一张支票.
sentences.en: In a sense we have come to our nation's capital to cash a cheque.

sentences.cn: 当我完成一项工作时,我总是感到很高兴.
sentences.en: I always feel pleased when I have finished a piece of work.

sentences.cn: 我们正抢时间完成这项实验.
sentences.en: We are against time to finish the experiment.

sentences.cn: 但是一旦你完成了这个测试,让我知道它是如何!
sentences.en: But asas you are finished with the test let me know how it was!

sentences.cn: 认清工作全部完成时的成果该是什麽样子的,然后只在工作全部完成时才交件.
sentences.en: Understand what finished work looks like and deliver your work only when it is finished.

sentences.cn: 在他的指导下, 我们顺利地完成了工作.
sentences.en: Under his guidance, we finished the work smoothly.

sentences.cn: 采用基于参考模型的方法快速完成了JPEG2000IP核的验证仿真工作.
sentences.en: The simulation and verification of JPEG 2000 IP core is fast finished based on reference model.

sentences.cn: 我们在为完成这本词典而昼夜不停地工作着!
sentences.en: We are working all round the clock to finish this dictionary!

sentences.cn: 他们自己完成了这项工作.
sentences.en: They finished the work by themselves.

sentences.cn: 协助其他职能用累积图表完成产品质量统计.
sentences.en: To assist other functions to finish quality analysis in cumulative charts ( trend analysis ).

sentences.cn: 满月通常意味着完成.
sentences.en: A full moon always brings a finish.

sentences.cn: 整机改造完成后, 性能指标大幅度提高.
sentences.en: After revamping, the specifications of finishing main drives are improved remarkably.

sentences.cn: 他的目标是在10月前完成.
sentences.en: His oBjective was to finish By OctoBer.

sentences.cn: 如果我能尽早完成我的事情, 我就回来.
sentences.en: If I can finish up my business soon enough, I shall be back.

sentences.cn: 我们肯定能按时完成任务.
sentences.en: We can certainly have the job finished on time.

sentences.cn: 单击“完成”添加此方法.
sentences.en: Click Finish to add the method.

sentences.cn: 具有高主动性, 擅于高压力下展开工作,带领部属完成各项任务.
sentences.en: High initiative, being good at working in high pressure and leading subordinate to finish each task.

sentences.cn: 可是完成之后, 却没有其他的活计可做了.
sentences.en: After they have finished it, they have no more work lined up.

sentences.cn: 我需要一小时左右结束这篇报告。
sentences.en: I need about an hour to finish off this report.

sentences.cn: 比赛于10:30结束。
sentences.en: The play finished at 10.30.

sentences.cn: 交响乐在响亮的乐曲声中结束。
sentences.en: The symphony finishes with a flourish.

sentences.cn: 饭后一杯咖啡，美餐圆满结束。
sentences.en: A cup of coffee finished the meal perfectly.

sentences.cn: 当日结束时美元汇率略有下降。
sentences.en: The dollar finished the day slightly down.

sentences.cn: 古尔德先生结束演讲后，全场起立鼓掌并热烈欢呼。
sentences.en: Mr Gould was given a standing ovation and loud cheers when he finished his speech...

sentences.cn: 男：你这么问很有趣，因为我从来没有感到过：“啊，我完成了！”我看着比赛结束时的足球运动员，你知道的，哨声响起，他们或输或赢。

sentences.cn: 杰克·托伦斯: 你认为他该去看医生 吗 ?
sentences.en: Jack Torrance : You think maybe he should be taken to a doctor?

sentences.cn: 他的热情 、 友谊 、 爱情和复仇的漫长历程,到此结束了.
sentences.en: His odyssey of passion, friendship, love, and revenge was now finished.

sentences.cn: 那些杂技演员以依次劈一字腿的动作,结束了他们的表演.
sentences.en: The acrobats finished their act by doing the splits in turn.

sentences.cn: 工作一结束你就到这里来.
sentences.en: Come here as soon as you finish the work.

sentences.cn: 要是你加紧, 我们可以在天黑前结束工作.
sentences.en: If you speed up your work, we can finish before it is dark.

sentences.cn: 他把眼前承担的事一结束,就立即动身.
sentences.en: He will leave as soon as he has finished with his immediate commitments.

sentences.cn: 牌局结束后, 玩牌的人都把筹码兑成现金,各自回家去了.
sentences.en: When the card game finished, the players cashed in their chips and went home.

sentences.cn: 结束划水前的推水动作要有力.
sentences.en: Finish arm stroke strong.

sentences.cn: “ 你何时才能结束这工作? ” 他没精打采地问道.
sentences.en: " When will you finish the job? " he asked dully.

sentences.cn: 你已经结束了在市政府的肮脏勾当, 是 吗 ?
sentences.en: So you've finished your dirty work at the Town Hall, have you?

sentences.cn: 当人们结束和别人的谈话时,他们也不说心里确实在想的事情.
sentences.en: People also don't say exactly what they are thinking when they finish conversations with other people.

sentences.cn: 法庭结束讨论休会了.
sentences.en: The court finished its discussion and closed up shop.

sentences.cn: 工作一结束,你就到这里来.
sentences.en: Come here asas you finish the work.

sentences.cn: 按下键录制,看完时释放结束录制.
sentences.en: Press the button to record and release it when you've finished.

sentences.cn: 特别是在今年季后赛结束,他要球队寻求交易未果之后.
sentences.en: Anything less than a playoff finish and he is liable to a tantrum toa deal.

sentences.cn: 在结束了该场拍摄后,许飞哭了.
sentences.en: After finishing acting that scene, Xu cried.

sentences.cn: 比赛结束前他在场,亲眼目睹了“球迷”们的狂热.
sentences.en: He at the finish and witnessed the excitement of the fans.

sentences.cn: 战争还没结束.
sentences.en: The war has not finished yet.

sentences.cn: 他讲话结束时引用了莎士比亚的语录.
sentences.en: He finished his speech with a quotation from Shakespeare.

sentences.cn: 工作结束后请收拾好所有工具.
sentences.en: Please tidy away all the tools when you finish the work.

sentences.cn: 们把桌子上的东西全吃光了.
sentences.en: We finished up everything on the table.

sentences.cn: 我吃光了一个比萨,还有一个热狗.
sentences.en: I finished off a pizza and then a hot dog.

sentences.cn: 孩子们一会儿就把他们盘子里的东西吃光了.
sentences.en: The children finished the food on their plates in a wink.

sentences.cn: 晚饭时我们将把剩下的肉吃光.
sentences.en: We'll finish up the remains of the meat for supper.

sentences.cn: 猫会把鱼吃光的.
sentences.en: The cat will finish up the fish.

sentences.cn: 他把晚饭吃剩的羊肉全吃光了.
sentences.en: He finished up the remains of the mutton for dinner.

sentences.cn: 我希望你们孩子们每人把你们自己的饭菜吃光.
sentences.en: I want all you children finish up your dinners.

sentences.cn: 他吃光了馅饼,又开始吃蛋糕了.
sentences.en: He finished off the pie and started on the cake.

sentences.cn: 他把菜吃光了.
sentences.en: He finished the dishes.

sentences.cn: 他要你们这些孩子把饭全部都吃光.
sentences.en: He wanted all you children to finish up your dinners.

sentences.cn: 那熊用舌头一舔就把蜜吃光了.
sentences.en: With one lap of his tongue the bear finished the honey.

sentences.cn: 比赛结尾是激动人心的.
sentences.en: It was an exciting finish.

sentences.cn: 续写三句话给小故事结尾.
sentences.en: Write 3 sentences to finish the story.

sentences.cn: 比赛的结尾是激动人心的.
sentences.en: The finish of the race was exciting.

sentences.cn: 如何用告别讯息结尾一封非正式信函聆听并重复: 爱你的贝蒂.
sentences.en: How to finish an informal letter with a farewell message Listen and Repeat: Love from Betty.

sentences.cn: 这篇文章的结尾是我匆匆做好的一个文档 ( 见下图 ).
sentences.en: To finish out this post, here is a ( somewhat cheesy ) document I whipped up.

sentences.cn: “我，”他以富有诗意的语言结尾，“将守候着你，直至晨光初露。”
sentences.en: "I," he finished poetically, "will watch over you to the break of day."

Sentence.sentence: Although this incident very much alters the race of the two participants competing for a win, both are going to continue on their way toward the finish line.

Sentence.sentence: Perhaps the point of writing the flawless  essay was not to give up, but to never willingly finish.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: He could not watch television except for two programs aweek, could not play with his friends after school until he finished his homework, and had to read two books a week and write book reports about them.

Sentence.sentence: But that afternoon, even though I'd finished my assigned work, I was told to help other colleagues finish their work, too.
Sentence.come: 2016年6月四级真题（第一套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Perhaps the point of writing the flawless essay was not to give up, but to never willingly finish.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: So it may seem rather strange that I have returned to college to finish the degree I left undone some four decades ago.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月四级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: You might imagine the job you'll get when you finish school.
